channel.title: Labels on Il y a du thé renversé au bord de la table, by David "Yoric" Teller
channel.description: Recent content in Labels on Il y a du thé renversé au bord de la table, by David "Yoric" Teller

item.title: Possibly one step towards named arguments in Rust
item.description:
A number of programming languages offer a feature called “Named Arguments” or “Labeled Arguments”, which makes some function calls much more readable and safer.

Let’s see how hard it would be to add these in Rust.
